t=int(input())
for _ in range(t):
 n=int(input())
 s=list(input())
 ans=s
 for i in range(n):
  x=s.copy()
  del(x[i])
  for j in range(n):
   ans=min(ans,x[:j]+[s[i]]+x[j:])
 print("".join(ans))

for _ in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 #s=input() 
 mini=["z"]*100
 s=list(input().strip())
 # n=len(s)
 ans=min(mini,s)
 t=s[:]
 for i in range(n):
  #remove s[i]
  curr=s[i]
  f=0
  ind=0 
  temp=s[i]
  for j in range(i):
   if s[j]>curr:
    s.pop(i)
    s.insert(j,temp)
    ans=min(ans,s)
    break 
  s=t[:] 
  # print(s)
 for i in range(n):
  #remove s[i]
  curr=s[i]
  f=0
  ind=n-1 
  temp=s[i]
  for j in range(i+1,n):
   if s[j]>curr:
    s.pop(i)
    s.insert(j-1,temp)
    ans=min(ans,s)
    break 
  else:
   s.pop(i)
   s.insert(n-1,temp)
   ans=min(ans,s)
  s=t[:] 
 #ans=min(pzbl)
 print(*ans,sep='')

t = int(input())
for T in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 s = input()
 ans = s
 val, val1 = '', ''
 for i in range(n):
  ##print(val, end = " ")
  val = s[:i] + s[i + 1:]
  for j in range(n):
   val1 = val[:j] + s[i] + val[j:]
   ##print(val1)
   ans = min(ans, val1)
 print(ans)

for _ in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 s = input()
 l = []

  yo = s[:i] + s[i+1:]
  for j in range(n):
   k1 = yo[:j] + s[i] + yo[j:]
   l.append(k1)
 l.sort()
 print(l[0])
